item.title: âœ´ï¸ Binance CEO CZ revealed that he is focusing his efforts on four main initiatives: Giggle Academy,...
item.description: âœ´ï¸ Binance CEO CZ revealed that he is focusing his efforts on four main initiatives: Giggle Academy, YZi Labs, the BNB ecosystem, and advancing global cryptocurrency adoption. This year, BNB Chain has seen remarkable growth, with transaction volumes increasing by 600% and more than 2 million daily active users. CZ highlighted the importance of delivering value to "real developers" and expressed optimism that the BNB ecosystem could outgrow any individual business operating within it.

item.title: ğŸ—“ Today's Key Highlights â€” December 19, 2025:
item.description:
ğŸ—“ Today's Key Highlights â€” December 19, 2025:
ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º The EU-Russia summit, taking place from December 18-19, is centered on the confiscation of Russian assets and may be extended through December 21. ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ Japan's Consumer Price Index (CPI) data will be released at 02:30 Moscow time, followed by the Central Bank's rate announcement at 06:00 and a press conference at 09:30. ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º President Putin will hold a live Q&A session at 12:00, which can be accessed here.

item.title: ğŸ”— EU member states were unable to come to a consensus on seizing Russian assets during the initial d...
item.description: ğŸ”— EU member states were unable to come to a consensus on seizing Russian assets during the initial day of discussions, primarily due to Belgium's requests. Negotiations will carry on. The EU summit has directed the Commission to develop a "reparation credit" for Kyiv utilizing Russian assets. In addition, the EU has agreed to extend a â‚¬90 billion interest-free loan to Ukraine for the years 2026-2027. Hungary, Czechia, and Slovakia have chosen to withdraw from the funding initiative. Ursula von der Leyen proposed that a qualified majority vote could potentially allow for the unfreezing of sovereign Russian assets.

item.title: ğŸ”¥ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ Japan's central bank has raised interest rates to a 30-year peak of 0.75%, as anticipated, marki...
item.description: ğŸ”¥ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ Japan's central bank has raised interest rates to a 30-year peak of 0.75%, as anticipated, marking the first increase since January 2025. The yield on 10-year Japanese bonds has reached 2%, the highest level since 2006, amid ongoing inflation that exceeds targets. The bank indicates a potential for gradual further rate increases. Read more

item.title: ğŸ“ˆ The Central Bank of Russia is set to implement a slight decrease in the key interest rate in light...
item.description: ğŸ“ˆ The Central Bank of Russia is set to implement a slight decrease in the key interest rate in light of worries that an increase in VAT could trigger higher inflation. During today's meeting, the CBR is expected to lower the rate by 0.5%, bringing it down to 16%. Notably, inflation is decreasing more rapidly than the CBR had anticipated, as reported by Bloomberg. item.title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Marina Chekurova, the head of the rating agency "Expert RA," stated in an interview with RIA Novo...
item.description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Marina Chekurova, the head of the rating agency "Expert RA," stated in an interview with RIA Novosti that the Russian Central Bank's key interest rate is expected to drop to between 11% and 12% by the end of 2026, down from the current rate of 16.5%. She predicts that the regulator will begin actively lowering the rate in the latter half of 2026.

item.title: âš ï¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Rubio highlighted advancements in discussions about Ukraine, stressing the importance of addres...
item.description: âš ï¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Rubio highlighted advancements in discussions about Ukraine, stressing the importance of addressing the most challenging issues that remain. He pointed out that wars usually conclude through either surrender or negotiation, and since neither side has shown a willingness to surrender, negotiations are continuing. Talks between the U.S. and Ukraine are scheduled for Friday and Saturday in Miami. U.S. Ambassador to NATO Matthew Whitaker mentioned that the weekend's discussions will shed light on Moscow's plans for resolving the conflict by 2026.

item.description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ The behavior of U.S. stocks during Trump's presidency mirrors trends from his initial term. After chaotic tariff declarations, a phase of stabilityâ€”dubbed "Trump equilibrium"â€”emerges. Trump often highlights stock market milestones, showing his focus on the S&P 500. He has promised to keep stock values elevated. Given that U.S. households have significant investments, any letdown could influence voter sentiment as the midterm elections approach. For more details, visit MT in MAX.
